author: zahary.
content:
In the last implementers call I promised to write down some ideas regarding simplifying the initial interop tests in testnets backed by a deposit contract

I've made a PR with a proposal for this here:
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/pull/93

... but it would be easier to go straight for the md file here:
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/blob/d22b82381e284471580a7699d6e8a0175d969bf9/interop/deposit_contract_testnets/README.md
